content.description: Start standing on the blunt arete to the right of the cave using two left-facing sidepulls. Move straight up the arete to top out.
content.location: It is on the right side of the cave on an obvious, blunt arete.

content.description: Start with your left hand on the diagonal crimp rail and your right hand to the right on a flat crimp rail. Figure out where to put your feet, and make a tough opening move to a triangular mini-jug (up and right of the left hand starting hold). Move straight up through a couple more moves, and top it out.
content.location: Looking at the main cave, circle the boulder to the right. The climb starts between two trees.

content.description: Mushroom Boulder is a large boulder perched atop some smaller rocks, creating a cave beneath. This will definitely house some very difficult lines out of the cave for anyone strong looking to do a FA. The boulder is surrounded by a couple other boulders with potential as well.
